name: Data-base & AI
text: Prepearing, cleaning, visualizing data for using and training Neural Network. Operationg with venv and Python libraries, such as SciKit-learn, Pandas, Seaborn and etc.

name: Post - Feed
text: Single Page Application of a social networks feed. Working with DB, making async requests, parsing new data to API. Principles of requests and responds.

name: Game on pure JS
text: Simple game on pure JavaScript and CSS rules. Only front-end.

name: Log-In
text: Passport Aplication. Managing data with MongoDB. Setting up framework Express.js and Node.js.
